name: Metal Generator
explanation: Metals for resource and material tables. Subtables have been sorted from common to rare.

tables.name: metal
tables.explanation: Subtables present metals known in different types of cultures and genres. The first subtables are compatible with most gameworlds, and  get more specialized towards the end. Some subtables intentionally overlap.

tables.name: base
tables.explanation: Common metals that are easily corrored or oxidized.

tables.name: ferrous
tables.explanation: Common metals containing iron. Intentionally overlaps with the alloy subtables.

tables.name: noble
tables.explanation: Common metals that are resistant to corrosion or oxidation.  Excludes metals from modern and scifi subtables. Overlaps with the precious subtable.

tables.name: heavy
tables.explanation: Dense and toxic metals for modern settings.

tables.name: modern
tables.explanation: Metals discovered in the modern time period.

tables.name: mythic
tables.explanation: Imaginary metals rumoured to have existed.

tables.name: scifi
tables.explanation: Imaginary metals for science fiction worlds.
